subject:
VIDIT PRASHANT GALA, NATIONAL INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY, SURATHKAL |
 SKILL INDIA DIGITAL HUB & NATIONAL SKILL DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION: URGENT REMINDER
body:
DEAR STUDENT BEARING NAME/ENROLLMENT ID: VIDIT PRASHANT GALA FROM NATIONAL
INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY, SURATHKAL
[ELIGIBILITY:  IS25]
[IMPORTANT NOTICE]

Salutations!

Students are encouraged to enroll in the Career Launchpad Program,
officially accredited by the National Skill Development Corporation and
Skill India Digital Hub, to gain valuable skills and advance their careers.

Should you know of any classmates who have not received this, please feel
free to pass this email along.

Students are required to submit their applications. Those who are
shortlisted will receive a response from our HR team.

Proceed with your Application <https://forms.gle/vaSKyPeTNfBbi5Tt7>
THIS NOTIFICATION IS INTENDED FOR STUDENTS ENROLLING IN THE
OCTOBER-NOVEMBER, NOVEMBER-DECEMBER, DECEMBER-JANUARY, AND JANUARY-FEBRUARY
BATCHES WHO HAVE NOT YET ACCEPTED THEIR SCHOLARSHIP.
*Please note: If this email has landed in your junk or spam folder, there
is no cause for concern. This may occur due to a full inbox or technical
issues. Kindly mark this message as "Not Spam" to ensure you receive future
emails correctly.*

*Program Details [Real-Time Industry Exposure]*

Over 10 Industry-Based Learning Projects: Students will undertake
individual minor projects that align with the topics they are currently
studying.

Collaborative Live Industrial Project with an MNC Partner: Experience
teamwork by collaborating with 3 to 4 peers on a real-time project provided
by a multinational company or startup.

*PROGRAM COMPLETION CERTIFICATE ACCREDITED BY NSDC & SKILL INDIA DIGITAL
HUB*


   - Co-branded internship certificate from leading multinational companies
   (MNCs).
   - 100% placement assistance to support your career goals.
   - Membership in a growing and dynamic community.
   - Industry-focused projects and case studies integrated into the program.
   - Outcome-driven with a 100% success rate.
   - Curriculum featuring cutting-edge topics including Generative AI and
   Prompt Engineering.
   - Exclusive masterclasses led by founders and CXOs from top global
   companies.
   - Personalized instructors providing tailored guidance and mentorship.



*ADITYA SINGH*
*Senior Academic Counselor*
*Advance Internship Program*
HR Manager’s Office

������ Aditya.Singh2404@gmail.com <neiljordan91649@gmail.com>
������ Official Website <http://launchedglobal.in/>

subject: You have been added to the Microsoft Team for CS809 - Seminar
body:
MICROSOFT TEAMS

You have been added to a new Microsoft Team CS809 - Seminar under NITK Organization.

Go to Microsoft Teams and login with your @nitk.edu.in email ID as username. If you do not recall the password to your Microsoft Edu Account (Linked with viditgala.252is012@nitk.edu.in), you may reset it on IRIS by going to your profile.

If you do not see the team added to the list of teams you are part of, please wait for at least 24 hours after you have received this email.


IRIS - Integrated Resource and Information Sharing

National Institute of Technology Karnataka, Surathkal

body:

subject: Tips for using your new inbox
body:
Tips for using your new inbox
[image: Gmail]

Welcome to your inbox
[image: Search]
Find emails fast
With the power of Google Search in your inbox, you can archive
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6576?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
all your email and find it
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6593?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
later in a flash. Your inbox stays tidy, and you never need to worry about
what to keep.
[image: Personalize]
Personalize National Institute of Technology Karnataka Mail
Customize inbox backgrounds, email signatures, and other options in National
Institute of Technology Karnataka Mail settings
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6562?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>.
Review and adjust your privacy and security settings at My Account
<https://myaccount.google.com/>.
[image: Organize]
Organize your email
You can organize email with labels
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/118708?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>,
which are like folders, but you can add more than one label to a message.
You can also use filters
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/6579?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
to automatically sort and categorize messages as they come in.
[image: Social]
Chat and meet directly from your inbox
Message with contacts in Google Chat
<https://support.google.com/chat/answer/9341104?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
and start video meetings with up to 100 people in Google Meet
<https://support.google.com/mail/answer/9822902?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
all without leaving Gmail.

Get training and tips
Find Gmail guides, tips, cheat sheets, help switching from Microsoft®
Outlook®, and more at the Google Workspace Learning Center
<https://support.google.com/a/users/answer/9259748?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>
.
Visit the Learning Center
<https://support.google.com/a/users/answer/9259748?hl=en&utm_source=gmailwelcomeemail&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=gmailwelcome>

Happy emailing,
The Gmail Team
[image: Google Cloud]

© 2025 Google LLC 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043

*You’re receiving this mandatory email service announcement to update you
about important changes to your Google Cloud product or account.*

subject: Re: INTERNSHIP COORDINATOR RECRUITMENT
body:
Dear all,

This is a gentle reminder to apply for the *Internship Coordinator
positions* with Team CDC.
We are still looking for more number of *motivated and enthusiastic
candidates* who are eager to make an impact in shaping the internship
journey for our batch.

 *Why you should apply:*

   -

   Get direct exposure to *HR professionals and top recruiters*.
   -

   Sharpen your *leadership, organizational, and communication skills*.
   -

   Take on a *key role in driving internship success* for your peers.

This is not just a responsibility, it's a *valuable opportunity* to build
your professional network and gain real-world experience that will help you
in both *placements and career growth*.

We strongly encourage maximum participation. If you’re enthusiastic,
proactive, and willing to contribute, don’t miss this chance to be a part
of the *Internship Coordination Team 2025-26*.



*Apply Now and Be the Change-Maker of Our Batch!*

Thank you & warm regards,

*Aakash*

Core Placement Coordinator
------------------------------

Career Development Centre (CDC) <https://cdc.nitk.ac.in/>

National Institute of Technology Karnataka (NITK)

Ph: +91 7754873480

subject: INTERNSHIP COORDINATOR RECRUITMENT
body:
Hello PreFinal Years of Batch 2027!

Team CDC is on the lookout for skilled and dedicated individuals to join us
as Internship Coordinators!

Why Apply?
Professional Networking: Build connections with HR professionals and top
recruiters.
Skill Enhancement: Develop your communication, organizational, and
leadership abilities.
Campus Engagement: Play a pivotal role in securing internships for your
peers.

What are we looking for?
- Strong communication abilities.
- Enthusiastic about supporting peers and improving the internship
experience.
- Highly proactive, organized, and keen to grow your professional network.

Ready to make an impact? Apply now!
https://iris.nitk.ac.in/form/pg_ic_recs_25-26
Deadline:13th September, 11:59pm
For more details, please refer to the brochure.
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1B7XUfQjJE1TAKeShDwLrx31IQFllHEIN5LOYzpFUL1Q/edit?usp=sharing

Let’s work together to make this internship season a huge success!



Thank you & warm regards,

*Aakash*

Core Placement Coordinator
------------------------------

Career Development Centre (CDC) <https://cdc.nitk.ac.in/>

National Institute of Technology Karnataka (NITK)

Ph: +91 7754873480

subject:
=?UTF-8?Q?Circular_to_Students_=E2=80=93_Registration_Portal_=7C=7C_Plac?=
	=?UTF-8?Q?ement_opportunities_=7C=7C_NITK?=
body:
*Dear VIDIT PRASHANT GALA,Bearing Roll Number:- 252is012 of NITK*

Greetings!

We are announcing a unique 3-month Job Driven Program offered by UNLOX, in
collaboration with leading MNCs. This SKILL INDIA & STARTUP INDIA program
is meticulously designed to equip you with practical, industry-relevant
skills essential for enhancing your career trajectory.

How to Apply:

Interested students must complete the Form to register their interest.
Shortlisted candidates will be contacted by our HR Team for the next steps.

Apply Here:-   *https://forms.gle/AZ9BZ1abpAuceh5v7*
<https://forms.gle/AZ9BZ1abpAuceh5v7>

Program Overview:

This comprehensive program is structured into distinct phases:

   -

   Intensive Training The Training features delivered through live lectures and
   continuous mentorship from experienced industry professionals also with
   BLU AI tool. No prior prerequisites are required, making it accessible
   to all interested students. Login credentials for the training platform
   will be provided upon successful registration.
   -

   Hands-on Internship & Projects by SMARTLABS
   The second month transitions into a practical internship phase,
offering live
   mentorship for projects. This hands-on experience will equip you with
   the skills to solve real-world industry challenges through:
   -

      Individual Projects: Each intern will be assigned 10 individual
      projects to complete under the direct guidance of their mentor.
      -

      Capstone Group Project: You will collaborate in groups of 10-12
      interns on a comprehensive Capstone Project, with specific tasks
      assigned to each team member. All essential data and materials
required for
      the project will be provided by UNLOX.

Flexible Learning Sessions:

   -

   Mentor-led/Live Sessions: Participate in live Zoom classes 3-4 days a
   week (scheduled after 7 PM IST). Recorded sessions will also be available,
   and you'll have 6-month access to our Learning Management System (LMS)
   portal.

Certifications & Career Outcomes:

Upon successful completion of the program, you will receive:

   - A Program Completion Certificate issued by UNLOX – verified by SKILL
   INDIA and STARTUP INDIA, and Certified by NASSCOM (India’s premier IT
   industry body).
   - An Internship Completion Certificate from our co-partner leading MNCs
   – endorsed & certified by NASSCOM.
   - Dedicated Placement Assistance to help you secure future opportunities.
   - Access to a growing professional community for networking and support.
   - PrepFree AI tool access for Mock Interview and Resume building.
   - Weekly Bootcamps, Guaranteed Job Recommendation with leading Companies.



*Disclaimer:The contents of this email may contain legally protected
confidential or privileged information   If you are not the intended
recipient, you should not disseminate, distribute or copy this e-mail.
Please notify the sender immediately and destroy all copies of this message
and any attachments. If you have received this email in error, please
promptly notify the sender by reply email and delete the original email and
any backup copies without reading them.*
